metadata.inclusion:
1. Navigate to the Settings page by pressing the gear icon
2. Select the About page
3. Select 'Advanced Z-Wave Utilities'
4. Select 'Add device'
5. Enter 00000 as the DSK for classic inclusion
metadata.exclusion:
1. Navigate to the Settings page by pressing the gear icon
2. Select the About page
3. Select 'Advanced Z-Wave Utilities'
4. Select 'Exclude garage opener'
5. Refer to the manufacturer's instruction for exclusion
metadata.reset: Press and hold the button on the back of the bridge for 20 seconds.
